title: Trump rages against court’s ruling against travel ban
text:
President Trump blasted the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals’ decision to maintain the temporary halt on his travel ban, branding it “disgraceful” in a Friday morning tweet.

“LAWFARE: ‘Remarkably, in the entire opinion, the panel did not bother even to cite this (the) statute.’ A disgraceful decision!” Trump wrote.

The tweet references a posting on the blog Lawfare, which found it curious that the appeals court didn’t bother to cite “the principal statutory basis for the executive order.”

“That’s a pretty big omission over 29 pages, including several pages devoted to determining the government’s likelihood of success on the merits of the case,” Lawfare writer Benjamin Wittes asserted.

The Lawfare article was discussed on MSNBC’s “Morning Joe” Friday morning.

Just after 8 a.m., the show excerpted a portion of the article — and less than 15 minutes later, the president tweeted that portion of the article.
summary:
President Trump blasted the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals’ decision to maintain the temporary halt on his travel ban, branding it “disgraceful” in a Friday morning tweet.
“LAWFARE: ‘Remarkably, in the entire opinion, the panel did not bother even to cite this (the) statute.’ A disgraceful decision!” Trump wrote.
The tweet references a posting on the blog Lawfare, which found it curious that the appeals court didn’t bother to cite “the principal statutory basis for the executive order.”“That’s a pretty big omission over 29 pages, including several pages devoted to determining the government’s likelihood of success on the merits of the case,” Lawfare writer Benjamin Wittes asserted.
The Lawfare article was discussed on MSNBC’s “Morning Joe” Friday morning.
Just after 8 a.m., the show excerpted a portion of the article — and less than 15 minutes later, the president tweeted that portion of the article.
